Text:
Note: The run-time of this is 8 minutes, if you're a casual viewer, it's probably not worth it for you to download this. Just making it available to those that are interested, as the years go by, everything will be valuable.

A one hour pre-race show is also available, leading up to the start of the race in full HD. The file size will be large (>4GB), so if anyone's interested, give a shout and I shall upload it.
